input_text:
Job Title: Field Service Technician

Location: Greensboro--Winston-Salem--High Point Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Company DescriptionIntegraServ is a leading provider of software, barcoding technologies, mobile integration, and hardware solutions to modernize businesses. With over 30 years of experience, we offer dependable implementation, application expertise, cost analysis, hardware comparison, and exceptional after-the-sale service. Our extensive product line includes offerings from top manufacturers such as Zebra, Honeywell, Printronix, MicroPlex, TallyGenicom, Datalogic, HP, Xerox, Kyocera, and more.
Role DescriptionAs a crucial part of our operations, the Field Service Technician will play a pivotal role in providing our customers with technical support, troubleshooting, and onsite repair services. This includes installing and configuring hardware and software systems, conducting equipment maintenance and upgrades, and ensuring customer satisfaction through timely and effective issue resolution.
QualificationsStrong technical skills and knowledge of software, barcoding technologies, and mobile integration.Fundamental knowledge of electronics troubleshooting and excellent mechanical skills.Experience in hardware installation, configuration, maintenance, and repair.Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities.Ability to provide exceptional customer service and build positive relationships.Effective communication and interpersonal skills.Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team.Attention to detail and strong organizational skills.Valid driver's license and safe driving record.Associate degree in a related field or equivalent experience. COPIER AND POS TECHS ARE ENCOURAGED TO APPLY.Prior technical field service experience and networking experience is a plus.
DutiesRespond to customer service calls dispatched from our call center and travel to customer sites to complete repair services.Service office and industrial impact, thermal, and laser printers from major manufacturers, including Printronix, Tally-Dascom, Zebra, Sato, Microplex, HP, Lexmark, and others.Complete and maintain Service Reports.Maintain vehicles, tools, and inventory and keep company property clean and orderly.Complete monthly Expense Reports promptly.Complete weekly Time Cards promptly.Comply with all corporate and customer safety policies.Valid driver's license and safe driving record.Other duties as assigned.

Benefits401(k)401(k) matchingDental InsuranceFlexible spending accountHealth insuranceLife insurancePaid time offParental leaveRetirement planVision insuranceCompany-provided vehicle, tools and training
PayBased on experience and qualificationsJob Type: Full-time Supplemental Pay TypesCommission pay. ScheduleMonday - Friday, 8 am - 5 pm. LocationPrimarily on the road with some depot/bench repair work at our Greensboro office License/CertificationDriver's License (Required)

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Field Service Technician
output_json.summary: A Field Service Technician is needed to provide technical support, troubleshooting, and onsite repair services.
preferred_degrees: Associate degree in a related field
required_skills: Experience in hardware installation, configuration, maintenance, and repair
Ability to provide exceptional customer service
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team
Attention to detail and strong organizational skills
job_responsibilities: Travel to customer sites for repair services
Keep company property clean and orderly
Comply with all corporate and customer safety policies
output_json.company_information: IntegraServ is a leading provider of software, barcoding technologies, mobile integration, and hardware solutions to modernize businesses.

other.content: Based on experience and qualifications, Job Type: Full-time, Supplemental Pay Types: Commission pay
Monday - Friday, 8 am - 5 pm, Location: Primarily on the road with some depot/bench repair work at our Greensboro office
